about_the_game:
Lost Moment is a short walking simulator where you need to find anomalies.

You wake up again in the middle of the night in your apartment. There’s still time to get some more sleep, but a glass of water before bed wouldn’t hurt. You head to the kitchen and... A knock at the door.

The whole game takes place in an apartment.
Your task is to search for anomalies.
You will wake up every hour and check: Has anything changed in your apartment? Has something appeared? Or someone?
If something is wrong, you need to exit through the front door.
If everything is fine, go back to sleep.

For the correct choice, time will move forward.
For the wrong one, you will be reset to the beginning.

The game features many unique anomalies that are noticeable.
You don’t need to search for them with a magnifying glass.

You need to last until 7 AM.
At least, that’s what you were promised.

Good night.

Play Time
30-120 min.

A message from the developer:
I made this game alone.
The translation into some languages may be inaccurate. If you notice an error, please report it in my Discord channel.

In the notes, I’ve placed my thoughts that trouble me.

Thank you in advance for playing :)

name: Lost Moment

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 1060
  • Storage: 1.01 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows11
  • Processor: Intel Core i9
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060
  • Storage: 1.01 GB available space

short_description: Look for various anomalies happening in your apartment. If you do everything correctly — time will move forward. If not — you will return. Good night.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
